title: Lee Byung Hun and Park Bo Gum looking into new film 'Ansi Fortress' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Lee Byung Hun and Park Bo Gum looking into new film 'Ansi Fortress' By KpopJoA 6 minutes ago 843 0 0 0 Google+ According to a representative on February 24, "Actors Lee Byung Hun and Park Bo Gum are currently looking into new film 'Ansi Fortress: Fortress of Abandoned People.' " 
Set during the Goguryeo Era, 'Ansi Fortress' depicts a battle taking place while protecting a barrier with director Kim Kwang Sik taking charge. Investment and distribution will be handled by NEW production company. 
The new film is currently receiving much attention due to two top stars being considered for the main roles. With Lee Byung Hun starred in numerous films like 'Inside Men' and 'Master' as well as abroad in Hollywood with 'Magnificient Seven.' Actor Park Bo Gum took the spotlight gaining much popularity in tvN 's drama 'Reply 1988' and KBS 's 'Love in the Moonlight.' 
It appears historical film 'Ansi Fortress' would indeed be a hit with such renowned actors; however, it is too early to say, as both Lee Byung Hun and Park Bo Gum are currently considering other projects as well. 
Stay tuned for more info!
